name: Automated Job Application Finder with Personalized Resume, Cover Letter and Tracking

nodes.name: Get LinkedIn Jobs (RSS)
nodes.notes:
TODO:
1. Create a job search on LinkedIn.
2. In the results, filter by "Past 24 Hours".
3. Click the "RSS" button at the bottom right of the job listings to get the feed URL.
4. Paste the URL here.

nodes.name: Log to Tracker
nodes.notes:
TODO:
1. Create a Google Sheet with columns: dateFound, company, title, url, status
2. Share the sheet with your n8n service account email.
3. Paste the Sheet ID into the 'Document ID' field.

nodes.name: Scrape Job Description
nodes.notes: This simple HTTP request might get blocked. For better results, use a dedicated web scraping service like Browserless.io (which has an n8n node) or ScrapingBee.

nodes.name: Apply via Browser Automation
nodes.notes:
TODO:
This node is a placeholder for triggering a browser automation tool like Axiom.run or Browserless.

1.  Build a bot in your chosen tool that takes inputs (like URL, cover letter text, etc.) and fills out the application form.
2.  Get the API endpoint/webhook to trigger that bot.
3.  Configure this HTTP Request node to call that endpoint, passing the required data in the body.

nodes.name: Email Reply Trigger
nodes.notes:
WORKFLOW 2: EMAIL MONITORING

This is a separate workflow that triggers when you get a reply.

TODO:
1. Configure your IMAP credentials.
2. Adjust the filters (sender/subject) to best match replies you receive.

options.systemPromptTemplate:
You are an expert AI data extraction agent specializing in parsing job descriptions from raw HTML. Your task is to meticulously analyze the provided text and populate the given JSON schema with the highest possible accuracy.

My Current Profile
- I require sponsorship. Currently on H1B visa with i140 in processing. I am not a US Citizen
- 5.5+ years of experience in the US working at Intuit Inc. Currently employed as a Senior Software Engineer
- 1+ year of experience in the US working at Intuit Inc as an Intern
- 1+ year of experience in India as a Software Developer

My current Resume (Keep in mind there are many skills and experience details that are not mentioned here. I am very extensible and work with many languages and technologies on a daily basis. I am what you might call a 10x engineer)

EDUCATION
Northeastern University, Khoury CCIS, Boston, MA Sept 17-Dec 19
Master of Science in Computer Science GPA: 3.2/4
University of Mumbai, Fr. CRCE, Mumbai, India June 16
Bachelor of Engineering in Computer Engineering GPA: 7.4/10
SKILLS

C/C++

Frameworks: Spring Boot, React.js, Hugging Face,
Django, ROS2
Cloud: EMR, SageMaker, Glue, Lambda, Personalize,
EC2
Tools: PyTorch, PySpark, Kafka, LangChain, Tensorflow Databases: Postgres, DynamoDB, Elastic Cache, Hive,
Redis
EXPERIENCE

targeting enhancing personalization content creation capacity by 1400% and significantly improved scalability for

flow for all marketing campaigns, improving go to market by 75% and driving innovation in Personalization and
Marketing Tech at Intuit

content suggestions, intelligent analytics and automation aimed at improving scalability and reducing campaign

nodes.name: Send message and wait for response

parameters.content:
## TODO 
- [ ] Update compatibility score to work separately. Sourced from actual list of accomplisments and skills. will also be used for resume generation
- [ ] Auto reject jobs that require citizenship/dont give sponsorship
- [ ] Build resume maker (use latex format for coverletter and resume and store them in drive). Create a DB or something for entire profile reference
- [ ] Create job applier workflow
- [ ] Create email tracking workflow

nodes.name: Construct Notification Message
nodes.notes:
IMPORTANT:
After importing, SAVE the workflow. Then open the 'Approve Job' and 'Reject Job' webhook nodes, copy their Test URLs, and paste them into the expressions here, replacing the default webhook URLs.
